metadata.description: Specifies the location for all resources.
Specifies the environment of the deployment.
Specifies the prefix for all resources created in this deployment.
Specifies the tags that you want to apply to all resources.
Specifies the administrator password of the sql servers in Synapse.
Specifies the object ID of the Enterprise Application "Microsoft Power Query".
Specifies the object ID of the Enterprise Application "Export to data lake".
Specifies the resource ID of the central purview instance to connect Purviw with Data Factory or Synapse. If you do not want to setup a connection to Purview, leave this value empty as is.
Specifies whether role assignments should be enabled for Synapse (Blob Storage Contributor to default storage account).
Specifies the resource ID of the subnet to which all services will connect.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for KeyVault.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Synapse Dev.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Synapse Sql.
